citations.query: What time is displayed on the gallery screenshot that demonstrates how to set gallery watch faces?
citations.raw_result:
The gallery screenshot that demonstrates how to set Gallery Watch Faces displays the time **10:08 AM**.

This time is overlaid on the watch face preview within the Huawei Health App’s Gallery screen, as part of the visual interface used to guide users through customizing their smartwatch display. The time appears consistently across multiple related images and UI elements associated with watch face customization, including those for the Honor Watch GS Pro and general Huawei Health App interfaces.

### References

- [1] Huawei Health App Gallery Screen for Watch Face Customization (image)
- [2] Huawei Health App Gallery Watch Face Customization Screen (image)
- [3] Huawei Health App Watch Face Upload Modal (image)
